#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
    ll t,cnt,k,i,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cnt=0;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=5;i<=n;i+=5)
        {
            ll l=0;
            k=i;
            ll temp=k;
            while(temp%5==0)
            {
                temp/=5;
                l++;
            }
            cnt+=(l*k);
        }
        cout<<cnt<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
